Philippe Laguerre (; 13 July 1958 – 11 September 2025), better known by the pen name Philippe Ward () was a French novelist.
Ward was primarily well known for his fantasy novels. He also co-wrote and translated with .
Ward died in Pamiers on 11 September 2025, at the age of 67.
